subject: Michael Silverstein's answer is the answer of the day!
msgSnippet: Friends, In continuation of my efforts on Knowledge management , beginning this new year http://www.mywirelesskit.com/index.html would every day pick one
messageBody:
Friends,
In continuation of my efforts on Knowledge management , beginning
this new year http://www.mywirelesskit.com/index.html would every
day pick one answer from each of its preferred Tech groups and
declare it as the answer of the day.

Dan

To view today's answer click below
http://www.mywirelesskit.com/daily-junit.html
